data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: At the concluding Treaty of Utrecht, Philip renounced his and his descendants' right to the French throne and Spain lost its empire in Europe. The British Empire ____ territorially ____: from France, Britain gained Newfoundland and Acadia, ____ from Spain, Gibraltar and Minorca. Gibraltar ____ a ____ naval ____ and ____ Britain ____ control ____ Atlantic ____ and ____ point ____ the Mediterranean. Spain also ceded the rights to the lucrative asiento (permission to sell slaves in Spanish America) to Britain.
data.partBlankContent: At the concluding Treaty of Utrecht, Philip renounced his and his descendants' right to the French throne and Spain lost its empire in Europe. The British Empire w__ territorially enla____: from France, Britain gained Newfoundland and Acadia, a__ from Spain, Gibraltar and Minorca. Gibraltar bec___ a crit____ naval ba__ and all____ Britain t_ control t__ Atlantic en___ and ex__ point t_ the Mediterranean. Spain also ceded the rights to the lucrative asiento (permission to sell slaves in Spanish America) to Britain.
data.fullContent: At the concluding Treaty of Utrecht, Philip renounced his and his descendants' right to the French throne and Spain lost its empire in Europe. The British Empire was territorially enlarged: from France, Britain gained Newfoundland and Acadia, and from Spain, Gibraltar and Minorca. Gibraltar became a critical naval base and allowed Britain to control the Atlantic entry and exit point to the Mediterranean. Spain also ceded the rights to the lucrative asiento (permission to sell slaves in Spanish America) to Britain.
data.answer: 在乌得勒支条约的最后，菲利普放弃了他和他的后代对法国王位的权利，西班牙失去了它在欧洲的帝国。大英帝国的领土得到了扩大:英国从法国获得了纽芬兰和阿卡迪亚，从西班牙获得了直布罗陀和米诺卡。直布罗陀成为一个重要的海军基地，并使英国得以控制大西洋进出地中海的地点。西班牙还将利润丰厚的“亚洲ento”(允许在西班牙美洲出售奴隶)的权利割让给英国。
